sense.gloss: there (place physically distant from both speaker and listener)
that far (something psychologically distant from both speaker and listener)
just like that (lit: in the time it takes to say "Ah!")
in the twinkling of an eye
in the blink of an eye
that (someone or something distant from both speaker and listener, or situation unfamiliar to both speaker and listener)
roasted mochi pieces (usu. flavoured with soy sauce, or sweetened with sugar, etc.)
that (indicating something distant from both speaker and listener (in space, time or psychologically), or something understood without naming it directly)
that person (used to refer to one's equals or inferiors)
that (something mentioned before which is distant psychologically or in terms of time)
such (about something or someone distant from both speaker and listener, or about a situation unfamiliar to both speaker and listener)

r_ele.reb: いいかげんにしなさい

sense.gloss: (in spite of) being old enough to know better
to grow timid (e.g. from an inferiority complex)

sense.s_inf: irregular forms such as いらした, etc. in colloquial Japanese; sometimes written 居らっしゃる

sense.gloss: (after a -te form, or the particle "de") is (doing)
to lose one's presence of mind
some (at the start of a number in place of a digit)
person who chases after idol, showbiz star
oden (various ingredients, such as egg, daikon, or konnyaku stewed in soy-flavored dashi)
typical name for a female servant in the Edo-period
female with symptoms of gender identity disorder (i.e. a transvestite)

sense.s_inf: usually 屁 is へ, and おなら is in kana

k_ele.keb: お目出度うご座います
御目出度う御座います

r_ele.reb: おめでとうございます

sense.gloss: rice ball (often triangular, sometimes with a filling and wrapped in nori)
